set.name: DMX-04 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Hunter

property.name: Race
property.value: Black Command Dragon/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Galaxy breaker (This creature breaks all of your opponent's shields. After the attack, break all of your shields.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-04 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Hunter

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon/Hunter

property.name: Rules
Set
property.value: DMX-04 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all your opponent's creatures that have power 2000 or less into their owners' mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-04 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Hunter

property.name: Type
property.value: Psychic Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Mecha Del Sol/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature would be destroyed, you may discard a light card from your hand instead. ■ Psychic Link—At the start of your turn, if you have "Saint Ave Maria, Channeler of Suns" and "Merrianne, Vizier of Alps" in the battle zone, link them to this creature and flip this creature to its higher cost side. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-04 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Hunter

property.name: Type
property.value: Psychic Super Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Shining Command Dragon/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {QUATTRO BREAKER} ■ At the end of each of your turns, untap all your Hunter creatures in the battle zone. For each light Hunter creature untapped in this way, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. ■ When this creature would leave the battle zone, you may discard a card instead. {LINK RELEASE} (When this creature leaves the battle zone, choose one of its psychic cells and return it to your hyperspatial zone and flip the rest of the cards.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Victory Rare

property.value: DMX-04 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Hunter

property.name: Race
property.value: Liquid People/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose up to 2 creatures in the battle zone and return them to their owners' hands.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-04 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Hunter

property.name: Race
property.value: Demon Command/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -6000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) ■ When this creature would be discarded from your hand by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or ability of a creature, you may put it into the battle zone instead.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-04 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ This creature attacks each turn if able. ■ Whenever your Hunters attack, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker".

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-04 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-04 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Hunter

property.name: Type
property.value: Psychic Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Race
property.value: Light Bringer/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a light Hunter psychic creature that costs 6 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.) {SAVER}: Psychic Creature (When one of your Psychic Creature(s) would be destroyed, you may destroy this creature instead.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-04 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Hunter

property.name: Race
property.value: Gel Fish/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks a player and isn't blocked, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-04 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Hunter

property.name: Race
property.value: Brain Jacker/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature wins a battle, destroy it.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-04 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Hunter

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Hunters. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-04 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ At the end of your turn, return this creature to your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-04 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Hunter

property.name: Race
property.value: Snow Faerie/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of each of your turns, if this creature broke any shields that turn, return it to your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-04 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into its owner's mana zone. Then choose a non-evolution creature from your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent puts that creature into the battle zone.
